reviewText: straight up no chaser! An up close & personal documentary about what REALLY goes on in "The Hood"...a look at the struggle and the mindset of the struggling. Definitely a must see! Mr. Frazier & Miss Stanley did an exceptional job in my opinion.

Greetings,

This film is a fantastic journey thru the lives of some very significant folks in our Los Angeles metroplex.

This film is for real, really for real, and I am blessed to have it on my shelf.

One Love revtombrown
